paper_abstract: The complexity of the visibility region formed by a point light source after k diffuse reflections in a simple n-sided polygon is O(n(9)), which is the first result polynomial in n, with no dependence on k. This bound is an exponential improvement over the previous bound of O(n(2[(k+1)/2]+1)) due to Prasad et al. [8].
paper_title: The complexity of diffuse reflections in a simple polygon
